overview.en: Golden Light Coin is committed to creating the great blue sea of blockchain + game industry and keeping the leading edge of the game, becoming a globally decentralized gaming platform with users' satisfaction and social recognition.
overview.zh: Golden Light Coin 致力于开创区块链+游戏行业的伟大蓝海并持续保持游戏领先优势，成为用户满意、社会认可的全球去中心化游戏平台。
